column4: Hi guys! I have a MS keyboard, which by default sends alternate codes for the functions key, and in order to get the usual codes I must press a F buttun every time I boot. Is there any trick in order to get the function key working as expected automatically? thank you!
was just talking about that look at http://www.hidpoint.com/supported_devices.html
I can't understand, that page doesn't say anything
shows supported devices by that program
